page.title: 11Village Sports Clubs
page.content:
There are 3 sports clubs in Wrea Green :- Football, Cricket and Tennis. The football team plays in the local league on Sunday mornings. The team colours are :- yellow shirt, green shorts and yellow stockings. They play home matches on the Green but only have about 12 spectators.
The cricket club has 2 teams which play on the Green on alternate Saturday afternoons. The players change in the village inn (The Grapes) and have a caravan for the scorers to sit in. The tennis club has two tarmac courts at the end of Mill Lane. Junior membership costs #5 per season and families pay #23. The club has a tournament at the end of each season to find the best players.
